column1: The Pit Room////If you are new in town and not sure which bbq place to start with. The pit room is a good place to get a taste of Texas bbq. I had the ribs
column3: and 2 sides. The ribs was pretty good
column4: nice smoky flavor and the meat is very soft. I love the taco with shredded pork
column6: spicy sauce and you are good to go
